## Respawn If Stuck on Top of Wall Collision

This code makes it so if you are stuck on top of a wall collision and can't get out of it at all, you'll respawn.

<details>
<summary>NTSC-U</summary>

```powerpc
C256F0B8 0000000C
C0230004 807F0004
80A30008 80C30004
80C60004 70C78000
41820044 70C60060
4182003C 80A50090
80A50004 C04500E0
80C30000 88A60011
C064BEB0 FC021840
40800014 38A50001
2C0500F0 4180000C
C02401AC 38A00000
98A60011 00000000
```
</details>

<details>
<summary>PAL</summary>

```powerpc
C2573F08 0000000C
C0230004 807F0004
80A30008 80C30004
80C60004 70C78000
41820044 70C60060
4182003C 80A50090
80A50004 C04500E0
80C30000 88A60011
C0640428 FC021840
40800014 38A50001
2C0500F0 4180000C
C0246824 38A00000
98A60011 00000000
```
</details>
